title: Closing Ceremony

presenter: Carole Goble, School of Mathematics, University of Manchester

Paul Groth, Department of Computer Science, Faculty of Sciences, Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam (VU)
Harith Alani, Knowledge Media Institute (KMI), Open University (OU)
moderator: Chris Welty, IBM Thomas J. Watson Research Center
